channel.title: [PDF] drops

item.title: [PDF] drops
item.dc:creator: @anti_man444 anti man444
item.description:
@anti_man444 wrote:

how to fix the drops on project dungeon fest when i drop something you can’t see it it’s removed then or when npc’s drop things it be difficult to take it
i’m using project dungeonfest

maybe i’ve to change this?

[code] break;
case 112:
/*
* Transfer items between two interfaces.
/
switchItems2(player, packet);
break;
case 229:
/
* Equip.
/
equip(player, packet);
break;
case 234:
/
* Item option 1.
/
itemOption1(player, packet);
break;
case 66:
/
* Item select.
/
itemSelect(player, packet);
break;
case 69:
lootItem(player, packet);
break;
case 29:
/
* Item select.
/
itemSummon(player, packet);
break;
case 189:
/
* Item operate.
/
itemOperate(player, packet);
break;
case 248:
/
* Drop item.
/
drop(player, packet);
break;
case 194:
/
* Take item.
/
take(player, packet);
break;
case 117:
/
* Item on item.
/
itemOnItem(player, packet);
break;
case 202:
/
* Item on object.
*/

		itemOnObject(player, packet);
		break;
	case 131:
		/*
		 * Item on player.
		 */
		itemOnPlayer(player, packet);
		break;
	case 12:
		/*
		 * Item on npc.
		 */
		itemOnNPC(player, packet);
		break;
	}
}

private void itemOnPlayer(Player player, Packet packet)[/code]

anyone can help me and if you know how to change the warrior guild money to nor mal coins you can say that too

thank you very much
